message.content:
cs.IT, cs.DS, cs.CC, cs.SI, cs.NA. 

The paper deals with the concept of repair locality in distributed storage systems, which involves coding theory and information theory. Therefore, cs.IT (Information Theory) is the most likely sub-category. The paper also involves combinatorial aspects of repair locality, which suggests that it could belong to cs.DS (Data Structures and Algorithms) or cs.CC (Computational Complexity). Additionally, the paper discusses the upper bounds on minimum distance, which could place it in cs.SI (Social and Information Networks) or cs.NA (Numerical Analysis).
